45:10*r An ephah was a dry measure having the capacity of about 3/5 bushel or about 22 liters.
45:10*r A bath was a liquid measure equaling about 6 gallons or about 22 liters.
45:12*r A shekel weighed about 2/5 ounce or about 12 grams.
45:12*r That is, 60 shekels; the common mina was 50 shekels. Sixty shekels were about 1 1/2 pounds or about 690 grams.
